testcase.classname: Feature To Test Google Search Functionality
testcase.name: Validate Google Search is Working
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And User is on Google Search Page...........................................passed When User Enter a Text in Search Box........................................passed And Hit Enter Button........................................................passed Then User is Navigated to Search Results....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is Successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user navigated to homepage.............................................passed
